title: No rescue for UK bioethanol industry facing collapse
summary: Plants in Hull and Redcar have warned they will close without support after deal to allow US ethanol to come in tariff-free.

title: Suspended Labour councillor found not guilty of encouraging violent disorder
summary: Ricky Jones was filmed speaking at an anti-racism rally after last summer’s far-right riots that followed the Southport murders A suspended Labour councillor who called for far-right activists’ throats to be cut at an anti-racism rally has been found not guilty of encouraging violent disorder. Ricky Jones, 58, used the phrase “disgusting Nazi fascists” in a speech about last summer’s far right protests after the Southport murders, his trial at Snaresbrook crown court heard. Continue reading...
